caption.title: Net charge of H1N1 HA over time.
caption.p: ( A) Net charge from 1918 to 2008 in 1741 H1N1 sequences from human hosts, obtained from the IRD [ 28] at http://www.fludb.org. This figure confirms that the net charge of the HA H1N1 has not varied significantly since its introduction in 1918. ( B) as in (A), but with yearly means instead.
Click here for additional data file.
